alert.note: Alert for Lee; Russell; Scott; Washington; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 3:18PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Hazardous Fire Weather Conditions on Wednesday... .The combination of high winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create hazardous conditions for fires to spread on Wednesday afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN AND CENTRAL EAST TENNESSEE AND SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA... The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * TIMING...From late Wednesday morning through the afternoon and early evening. * WIND...Sustained winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph in most locations, with gusts up to 80 mph in the mountains and foothills. * HUMIDITY...Minimum values between 25% and 30% are expected. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or are expected to occur shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
